Articles.Content:
0.23 is here, and the new "effects" module is what we were waiting for.. Well, not really.. No one really mentioned adding new particle systems, like NEW particles, designed by us, I don't mean reusing stock ones.

I have seen the KSPParticleEmitter component, but the parttools don't export it.

Anyone here knows whats going on? Is this one of those working-but-not-documented things, or are we waiting for part tools 0.23?

Edited December 20, 2013 by nothke
